questions.getQuestion: SELECT * FROM questions WHERE question_log.id = $1 LIMIT 1
questions.getNextQuestion: SELECT * FROM questions ORDER BY last_used ASC LIMIT 1
questions.getLastQuestion: SELECT * FROM questions ORDER BY last_used DESC LIMIT 1
questions.setLastUsed: UPDATE questions SET last_used = to_timestamp($1) WHERE id = $2

users.createUser: INSERT INTO users (username, password, mobile_no) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
users.getPassword: SELECT id,password FROM users WHERE username = $1
users.changeNumber: UPDATE users SET mobile_no = $1 WHERE id = $2

scores.getScore: SELECT SUM (points) AS total FROM score_log WHERE user_id = $1
scores.getScores: SELECT users.username,SUM(score_log.points) AS total FROM score_log INNER JOIN users ON users.id = score_log.user_id GROUP BY users.id ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
scores.insertScore: INSERT INTO score_log (user_id, question_id, points) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
